class.name: KinematicCollision2D
class.description: Contains collision data for KinematicBody2D collisions. When a [KinematicBody2D] is moved using [method KinematicBody2D.move_and_collide], it stops if it detects a collision with another body. If a collision is detected, a KinematicCollision2D object is returned. This object contains information about the collision, including the colliding object, the remaining motion, and the collision position. This information can be used to calculate a collision response.

members.member: The colliding body's shape's normal at the point of collision.
The moving object's remaining movement vector.
The distance the moving object traveled before collision.
